tika-s0404t2:2_0: 21-27. Tatiyassa paṭhamadutiyesu natthi vattabbaṁ. Tatiye ‘‘hatthago’’ti vattabbe
tika-s0404t2:2_1: ‘‘hatthako’’ti vuttaṁ. So hi rājapurisānaṁ hatthato yakkhassa hatthaṁ, yakkhassa
tika-s0404t2:2_2: hatthato bhagavato hatthaṁ , bhagavato hatthato puna rājapurisānaṁ hatthaṁ gatattā
tika-s0404t2:2_3: nāmato hatthako āḷavakoti jāto. Tenāha ‘‘āḷavakayakkhassa hatthato hatthehi sampaṭicchitattā
tika-s0404t2:5_0: 28. Aṭṭhame khīṇāsavassa sabbesaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ aniccatā asammohavasena kiccato maggapaññāya
tika-s0404t2:5_2: maggapaññāyā’’ti. Ime kāmāti dvepi kāme vadati. Kilesavasena uppajjamāno hi pariḷāho
tika-s0404t2:5_3: vatthukāmasannissayo vatthukāmavisayo vāti dvepi sapariḷāhaṭṭhena aṅgārakāsu viyāti
tika-s0404t2:5_4: ‘‘aṅgārakāsūpamā’’ti vuttā. Anto vuccati lāmakaṭṭhena taṇhā, byantaṁ vigatantaṁ bhūtanti
tika-s0404t2:8_0: 29. Navame yasmā mahiddhikapetā devāsurānaṁ āvāhaṁ gacchanti, vivāhaṁ na gacchanti,
tika-s0404t2:8_1: tasmā pettivisayeneva asurakāyo gahitoti veditabbo. Petāsurā pana petā evāti tesaṁ
tika-s0404t2:11_0: 30. Dasame appicchassāti na icchassa. Abhāvattho hettha appasaddo ‘‘appaḍaṁsamakasavātātapā’’tiādīsu
tika-s0404t2:11_1: (a. ni. 10.11) viya. Paccayesu appiccho paccayappiccho, cīvarādipaccayesu icchārahito.
tika-s0404t2:11_3: bāhusaccavibhāvane icchārahito. Dhutaṅgappicchoti dhutaṅgesu appiccho dhutaṅgabhāvavibhāvane
tika-s0404t2:11_4: icchārahito. Santaguṇaniguhanenāti attani saṁvijjamānānaṁ jhānādiguṇānañceva bāhusaccaguṇassa
tika-s0404t2:11_5: dhutaṅgaguṇassa ca niguhanena chādanena. Sampajjatīti nipphajjati sijjhati. No mahicchassāti
tika-s0404t2:11_6: mahatiyā icchāya samannāgatassa no sampajjati anudhammassapi anipphajjanato. Pavivittassāti
tika-s0404t2:11_8: bhāvanābhiyogavasena ekībhāvova kāyavivekoti adhippeto, na gaṇasaṅgaṇikābhāvamattanti
tika-s0404t2:12_0: Sattehi kilesehi ca saṅgaṇanaṁ samodhānaṁ saṅgaṇikā, sā āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etassāti
tika-s0404t2:12_1: saṅgaṇikārāmo, tassa. Tenāha ‘‘gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya cevā’’tiādi. Āraddhavīriyassāti paggahitavīriyassa.
tika-s0404t2:12_2: Tañca kho upadhiviveke ninnatāvasena ‘‘ayaṁ dhammo’’ti vacanato. Esa nayo itaresupi.
tika-s0404t2:12_3: Vivaṭṭanissitaṁyeva hi samādhānaṁ idhādhippetaṁ, tathā paññāpi. Kammassa-katapaññāya
tika-s0404t2:12_4: hi ṭhito kammavasena bhavesu nānappakāro anatthoti jānanto kammakkhayakaraṁ ñāṇaṁ
tika-s0404t2:12_5: abhipattheti, tadatthañca ussāhaṁ karoti. Mānādayo sattasantānaṁ saṁsāre papañcenti
